name: Design Studio Cinematic Capsule
description: Atmospheric narrative fossil of the Sol.F1 design studio, tuned for cinematic delivery and emotional resonance.

scene.setting: A vast design studio with tall windows spilling soft daylight across drafting tables, holographic displays, and shelves lined with prototypes. Suspended dust motes glow like constellations in the beams of light.
scene.subject: Neutral mannequin-like figure at center stage, clay-toned and poised with latent potential as both sculpture and blueprint.

lighting.overhead: Diffused daylight softened by translucent panels
lighting.accent: Cyan glows from holo-UI consoles pulsing like heartbeat glyphs
lighting.mood: Precision intertwined with wonder; the studio resonates like a cathedral of invention

camera.angle: Three-quarter view from a subtle low vantage to emphasize presence and readiness
camera.depth: Shallow focus favors the figure while the studio dissolves into luminous abstraction
camera.motion: Slow cinematic drift as though the camera inhales with the environment
